about.title: Hi, I'm Portia
paragraphs: Piquant is my definition of how I make food: in an exciting way! And that spicy doesn't mean hot. To me, flavours come in different shapes & colours.
I'm passionate about cooking & authenticity is key. Everything is handmade & from scratch.
Hope to share all this & to see you enjoying my food soon!

image1.blurb: Plantano Rellano stuffed with avocado cream topped with chipotle adobe mushrooms

image2.blurb: Ackee & Saltfish money bags with house hot sauce

image3.blurb: 48-hour marinated slow cooked pulled jerk chicken served in a steamed coconut bun with Carabbean slaw

image4.blurb: Poached pear steeped in cinnamon, star anise, cardamon infused sorrel, with creme anglaise topped with crushed meringue & pistachios

image5.blurb: Spinach steamed bao bun filled with glazed bulgogi mushrooms and carrots

image6.blurb: Sweet potato & tumeric, spinach, coconut baos
